name: Ninja Evolution
description:
This is a game we made for the 61st weekly game jam, the theme was "update a game" and we made a platformer where the player is a ninja in which there is only one level that updates itself and becomes more complicated. You can play with either keyboard or gamepad (controls on main menu). We made this game in gamemaker studio. This was our first gamejam ever so please be nice ! We could not make it playable on the web but you can still download the zip file, Thank you for playing ;)

Proraming + level design = Edgar B.

Graphic assets = Leonard B.
